CustomObjectParticipant.name: CustomObjectParticipant
CustomObjectParticipant.description: Represents information about a participant in the context of a custom object record.

Comments.description: The additional information about the participant.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the record.

ParticipantId.description: The user or group associated with this participant.

ParticipantRoleId.description: The role associated with the participant.

ReferenceObjectId.description: The parent custom object record that's related to this participant record.
